body_html:
The problem is resolved in 1.0.0-rc0, 1 or 2.. Please upgrade and try again.

On Wed, Feb 8, 2017 at 9:23 PM, smasoudn ***@***.***> wrote: I have the same issue with tf.one_hot() . Here is my settings: - Windows 10 - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 - Cudda 8.0 - CuDnn 5.1 - TensorFlow 0.12 Error: Error polling for event status: failed to query event: CUDA_ERROR_ILLEGAL_ADDRESS Kernel died — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
The problem is resolved in 1.0.0-rc0, 1 or 2..
Please upgrade and try again.
